list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Add extra commands in maxida Disable https redirect for all domains (useful to test)
Fixed, suricata version select version missing variable Fixed memcached status installation paused and stopped the script from continuing
Add checking to select DNS provider external or local
Move ssl configuration after created DA accounts

task.summary: Default task
Initial release from beta Version 0.3.2.7-beta
Fixed maxicata directory creation (small changes) Change code to use built-in maxicata function to init config
Add required components installation and custom env file for maxicata (private code)
Fixed minor bug on extra curly bracket for MAXICATA_AIPDB_REPORT_URL variable for Maxicata script Maxicata - Fixed bug awk code empty. Re-add code file srch.awk
Add maxiperm installation

Fixed maxiperm wrong binary name from 'maxiperm' to 'perm' Fixed awk not display result due to missing awk binary. So, added gawk requirement for maxicata and other scripts added configure_maxicode_pre function to install pre-requisite components for all maxicode
Initial release alpha version v0.1 of maxida (MaxiDA) to manage directadmin functionalities and APIs Add new function to create reseller package using API
Add API for creating reseller account Add missing file maxida.env for maxida script
Change reboot order before requesting SSL for Directadmin (Disable reboot after installing CSF)
Remove 3rd party rules from maxisetup and add that in maxicata instead
Minor change- > improve _pause() function to accept both timeout and keypress, so during setup, we can skip sleep function by pressing enter.

Improve DA API such as adding a flexible way to start API session with da_api_admin "start_<role>" Add API to create packages for reseller and user Add API to create reseller and user account Fixed maxida.env at maxida file overwritten with blank environment variables when resume setup

Fixed maxida environment source file (maxida.env) not found Minor improvement of maxicata on package checking (auto install missing package) Add maxiaide alpha version 1.0 installation for Debian Add sample aide.conf for testing Note that maxida and maxiaide are currently at private repo that need git token access.

Add the ability to add DA user account dynamically from ENV file. For example:
If we want to create another user for example the 3rd user, we must supply this 5 variables in ENV file ending with the same suffix in this case is 3. You can choose whatever suffix number, the best practice is the suffix should be unique.
DA_USER_USERNAME3="myxuser" DA_USER_USERPASS3="x12321xxx" DA_USER_EMAIL3="webmaster@masternom.com" DA_USER_DOMAIN3="masternom.com" DA_USER_PACKAGE_NAME3="USER_UNLIMITED"
This user will be created automatically by Directadmin. Make sure to supply all the information for this 3rd user. If one of the information is missing, DA will not create this user for example domain is missing or email is not set from ENV for this user:
DA_USER_USERNAME3="myxuser" DA_USER_USERPASS3="x12321xxx" DA_USER_EMAIL3="" DA_USER_PACKAGE_NAME3="USER_UNLIMITED"
Then maxisetup will trigger error and tell that domain and email is not set for this user.
Able to select suricata version in ENV file. Remove unused variables

Add the ability to login as another user and add multiple domains into itself. For example to add multiple domain for a user muser use the following format in ENV file: ===== DA_USER_USERNAME2="muser" DA_USER_USERPASS2="password" DA_USER_EMAIL2="webmaster@kalibmedia.com" DA_USER_DOMAIN2="kalibmedia.com kalibtv.com kalibtest.com" DA_USER_PACKAGE_NAME2="USER_UNLIMITED" DA_USER_DOMAIN_ENABLE_SSL2="yes" =====
The script will automatically login as user 'muser' and add the 3 domains for itself
Now the API authentication can be passed dynamically. For example for this user use the following syntax:
start+${role_user}+${role_password}
I use the symbol + instead of _ because '+' is a unique and useless character which cannot be used as password in DA.
The previous API auth call has changed. eg: from start_admin change to start+admin

Update maxida --api to use any users to use that API (before only owner can use) (note maxida is a private repo) Update maxisetup DA API to set DKIM and obtained DKIM value. This value is important to be used by external DNS. For example, we can use linode API to update this DKIM value automatically as external DNS record. Linode API will be coming soon ...

Update DA API to be able to obtain the value of domain DNS record, dmarc, spf and dkim. These 3 values are important to have in order to prevent website or email spams. We will pass this value to external DNS such as linode (if it's enabled in ENV file as the external DNS provider)
Add additional information about the script feature

Add the ability to switch DA installation from beta to stable or vise versa based on Poralix idea:
Switch to stable version -> maxida --switch-da stable or switch to beta version -> maxida --switch-da beta
Switching to beta version is useful to test beta function of Directadmin. For example the wildcard certificate using external DNS is supported in beta version of DA only.
TODO: Planning to integrate script with wildcard certificate installation using Lego

1) Update maxida to use custombuild and directadmin functionalities.
For example to set directadmin ssl=1 use the following: maxida --da set ssl 1
To check Directadmin ssl setting:
maxida --da get ssl output: ssl=1
To reboot DA: maxida --reboot-da or maxida --da reboot
To build lesencrypt package: maxida --cb letsencrypt
To edit directadmin.conf: maxida --edit-daconf
To edit custombuild options.conf: maxida --edit-cbconf
To run DA in debug mode: maxida --debug or maxida --da debug
=====
2) Minor change to maxisetup

Add extra commands in maxida Disable https redirect for all domains (useful to test)
Fixed, suricata version select version missing variable Fixed memcached status installation paused and stopped the script from continuing
Add checking to select DNS provider external or local
Move ssl configuration after created DA accounts
